title: BRIEF-Spartan Energy Corp. Qtrly Affo Earnings Per Share $0.35
text: 18 PM / Updated 13 minutes ago BRIEF-Spartan Energy Corp. Qtrly Affo Earnings Per Share $0.35 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read   Spartan Energy Corp: * SPARTAN ENERGY CORP. ANNOUNCES 2017 FOURTH QUARTER AND YEAR END RESULTS AND ANNOUNCES SHARE REPURCHASE PROGRAM * SPARTAN ENERGY - HAS AUTHORIZED CO TO BUY FOR CANCELLATION UP TO 8.6 MILLION COMMON SHARES * SPARTAN ENERGY CORP - QTRLY LOSS PER SHARE $0.05 * SPARTAN ENERGY CORP - QTRLY AFFO EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.35 * SPARTAN ENERGY - QTRLY AVERAGE DAILY PRODUCTION 22,635 BOE/D VERSUS 15,750 BOE/D Source text for Eikon:
